creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
when a user deletes a page in the site tab and then changes back to the
authoring tab, lenya tries to open the page that was just deleted.

suggested fix: the delete usecase should change the uri to some reasonable
default, probably index.html.

I think Lenya should just go straight to the parent page, without any prompting.
 After one deletes a page one normally doesn't want to do anything else with it.
 And if one is deleting a number of pages then a repetitive prompt for an
unlikely action would be annoying.
